snippet.title: Cruise the Coast | Watopia’s Southern Coast is Now Open
snippet.description:
Say hello to Watopia's Southern Coast. This coastal expressway connects you around the island in record time, from Fuego Flats to the Mayan Jungle. Cruise the flat, fast roads, and enjoy some of the best views in all of Watopia.


Connect with Zwift:
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/zwift
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gozwift
Follow us on X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/gozwift
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gozwift/

Join millions of cyclists on the app that makes indoor cycling fun. Jump into immersive 3D worlds, challenge yourself on epic climbs, and ride on endless roads, all from the comfort of home. With racing, group rides, interval workouts, and structured training plans, Zwift can deliver serious fitness results.

Getting started is easy. Just download our app, connect your bike to a smarter trainer, and start your free trial. And if you want to run, you can do that for free. Just download our app, connect your treadmill or cadence tracker, and you’ll be Zwifting in no time.
